title: Low Priority Queue
body: So, a friend of mine has recently been getting endlessly placed into low priority queue. This is despite not having any leaves in her match history. I enjoy queueing with her, but the constant 10 minute wait before the queue even starts is getting a little frustrating. She's also played numerous games with the low priority penalty, with no leaves, with no avail.

replies.body: I suggest you have your friend make a post here so we can talk about what's going on.
There's no full story to get. Her match history has no leaves or afks.
Doesn't seem like we are getting the full story here.  Also low priority queues can be for afks and leaves.
